lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The federal Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is expected to announce soon that it will require an additional review of Genentech Inc's TPA heart drug, a move that likely will delay the company's plans to market the drug this spring, government and Wall Street sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: TPA stands for tissue plasminogen activator, and would be used on heart attack victims to clear blockage in a vein or artery.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Stuart Weisbrod, a biotechnology analyst with Prudential Bache Securities Inc., told Reuters the additional FDA review likely would keep TPA off the market until at least November.
